text: The Austro-Hungarian Empire's Luftfahrtruppen contained many pilots from many ethnic minorities. The following list of their World War I flying aces contains those Austro-Hungarian aces identified as ethnic Croatian or born in the territory of modern-day Croatia: * Miroslav Navratil, 10 verified victories. * Raoul Stojsavljevic, 10 verified victories. * Roman Schmidt, 6 verified victories. * Johann Lasi, 5 verified victories. ==See also== * List of World War I flying aces * List of World War I flying aces from the Austro- Hungarian Empire * List of World War I aces credited with 10 victories * List of World War I aces credited with 6 victories * List of World War I aces credited with 5 victories ==References== ;Notes ;Bibliography * Croatia Category:Lists of Croatian military personnel
title: List of Croatian World War I flying aces
